attributes.action: Demand to supermarkets stop selling non labelled Halal meats
attributes.background: A lot of people buying meats that they think are being slaughtered in a humane way but it appears they are now being mislead/lied that it is in fact Halal meat and not even labelled. This is barbaric and we need to put a stop to it.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition calling on Parliament to change the law to require the labelling of all halal products.
